channel.title: Menus on The Radnor Arms
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on The Radnor Arms

item.title: Weekday (inc. Sat)
item.description: Radnor Menu Starters Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £5 / Main: £7 Usually available, they are served with rustic bread and butter. Please ask at the Bar for the choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £5 Breaded Mushrooms served with salad garnish and homemade garlic mayo. Halloumi Fries (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and sweet chilli dips. Breaded Whitebait - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise.

item.title: Weekday Takeaway
item.description: Weekday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is only from 5.30pm - 7.00pm (orders must be made by 6.30pm) From the Sea Please note that fish may contain bones. Battered Cod £8.00 Radnor Fishcake £6.00 Scampi £7.00 Burgers & Sausages Bacon Double Cheese Burger £7.00 Beef Burger £4.

item.title: Sunday Lunch
item.description: Sunday Menu Starters Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £5 / Main: £7 Served with bread and butter. Please ask at the Bar for the day’s choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £5 Breaded Mushrooms served with salad garnish and homemade garlic mayo. Filled Potato Shells - £5 Choice of “Bacon and Cheese” or “Roast Peppers and Cheese” filled potato shells (three) served on a bed of salad. Freshly-battered Halloumi (V) - £6 Beer-battered Halloumi cheese served with a salad garnish, creamy mayonnaise and cranberry dips.

item.title: Sunday Takeaway
item.description: Sunday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is from 12pm - 12.30pm and 2pm - 2.30pm (orders must be made by 2pm Saturday) Roasts Half Roast Chicken (on the bone) £12.00 Roast Beef £13.00 Roast Lamb £13.50 Pumpkin, Mushroom & Chestnut Roast (gf/vg) £10.50 Mushroom, Brie,Hazelnut & Cranberry Wellington £13.50 All Sunday Roasts come with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of vegetables.

item.title: Wine List
item.description: Wine List White Wine Coleridge Hill Sauvignon Blanc Pino Grigo Chenin Blanc Rose Wine Pino Grigo Blush Zinfandel Blush Red Wine Malbec Merlot Shiraz Rioja Reserva Sparkling Wine Prosecco Vino Spumante Dessert Wine Monbazilliac

item.title: Beers
item.description: Beers The Radnor Arms stocks a range of draft and bottled beers (as well as wide range of spirits, wines and soft drinks). Our current draft beers are listed below. Guest draft Real Ales (between 1 - 2 on at a time) alter every few weeks, sourced from a variety of local and other extensive brewers. Draft Lagers Amstell (3.8 ABV) Fosters (4.
